Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Best Western Hotel Hannover-City, Superior, you'll be centrally located in Hannover, walking distance from Kestner Society and close to Ernst August Galerie. This hotel is within close proximity of SpielBank Hannover and Pavillon.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 54 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

Dining
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a business center, a 24-hour front desk, and an elevator (lift).


Pets not allowed Check-in time starts at 2 AM Check-out time is 11 AM
Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are available daily for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.


Make yourself at home in one of the 54 guestrooms. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones and safes, and housekeeping is provided daily.

With a stay at Best Western Hotel Hannover-City, Superior, you'll be centrally located in Hannover, walking distance from Kestner Society and close to Ernst August Galerie. This hotel is within close proximity of SpielBank Hannover and Pavillon.
Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

Kestner Society - 0.4 km / 0.2 mi
Ernst August Galerie - 0.6 km / 0.4 mi
SpielBank Hannover - 0.7 km / 0.4 mi
Pavillon - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Kroepcke - 0.8 km / 0.5 mi
Brauhaus Ernst August - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Galerie Artforum - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Ballhof - 0.9 km / 0.6 mi
Opera House - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Welfenschloss - 1 km / 0.6 mi
University of Hannover - 1 km / 0.6 mi
Historical Museum - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Marktkirche - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Leibniz House - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi
Schauspiel Hannover - 1.1 km / 0.7 mi

The preferred airport for Best Western Hotel Hannover-City, Superior is Hannover (HAJ) - 9.3 km / 5.8 mi.

Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy.
